overview:
Remy holds a PhD in Chemistry from the University of Bern in Switzerland and is fluent in French, German, Swiss German, and English. At Wildfire Interactive, Inc., Remy primarily focuses on product management.

Prior to Wildfire Interactive, Inc., Remy co-owned and managed Atalier GmbH, an online games and entertainment company that provided digital marketing solutions. It was here that he won a Swiss Dialog Marketing Award for his work on a Swiss Milk Producers campaign. Later he was Senior Consultant at Publicis Modem, the digital unit of Publicis, Switzerland’s largest advertising agency.

As a core-member of the Spartanic Rockers, a world-renowned Swiss/Japanese Breakdancing crew, Remy was able to travel the world judging and competing in numerous international breakdancing competitions. He also won an individual National Breakdance Championship title and is maintaining the longest running website about this dance on the web. Among his favorite things in life are gadgets, art, swimming, and reading.
